All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AbstractBLL<T>
 
AbstractDAO<T>
Generic data access object (DAO) providing common database operations.
AbstractView<T>
A generic JFrame implementation for displaying and interacting with a list of objects.
Bill
Represents a bill generated for an order.
BillDAO
The BillDAO class provides data access methods for manipulating Bill entities in the database.
Client
The Client class represents a client object with properties such as id, name, address, email, and age.
ClientAgeValidator
A validator for the age of a client object.
ClientBLL
The ClientBLL class is responsible for handling business logic operations related to Client classes.
ClientDAO
The ClientDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access methods specific to the Client class.
ConnectionFactory
A Class that connects the java code with the Database in the MySql
Controller
Controller Class for starting teh GUI classes !
EmailValidator
A validator for the email of the client object.
MainView
The main view of the application, which displays buttons for the different windows (Clients, Orders and Products).
Order
The Order class represents an order object with properties such as id, quantity, client, and product.
OrderBLL
The OrderBLL class is responsible for handling business logic operations related to Order classes.
OrderDAO
The OrderDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access methods specific to the Order class.
Product
The Product class represents a product object with properties such as id, stock, name, and price.
ProductBLL
The ProductBLL class is responsible for handling business logic operations related to Product classes.
ProductDAO
The ProductDAO class extends the AbstractDAO class and provides data access methods specific to the Product class.
ReflectionExample
 
Start
Main Class for starting !
Validator<T>
An interface for a validator.
